name: Bank web app - with live components
description:
A functioning bank app powered by Anima & Strapi: 


  • Live Demo
  • Full project on Github


We redesigned SVBs banking dashboard using Anima's open source Component Library for Figma, then connected our data using Strapi's headless CMS.


Anima brings leading open source libraries like Ant Design, MUI, and Recharts into Figma, enabling R&D teams to ship React apps faster than ever!
